name: Hikaru no Go: Heian Gensou Ibunroku
overview: Hikaru no Go - Heian Gensou Ibunroku is an alternate story set in Japan's Heian period. The ghost/demon world is invading the physical, and before you can destroy each invader you must defeat them in a game of Go. To find where the invader will be, you choose moves on an enchanted Go board in the temple. To hone your abilities, you play against friends, earning Talisman cards that give you the ability to cheat against the demons.
